caption.title: Comparison of interventions in response to three different sizes of epidemic.
caption.p: The baseline is R 0 = 1.26. Another two severe epidemics (R 0 = 1.9 and R 0 = 2.6) were simulated as well. Red lines indicate the case of R 0 = 1.26; green lines show intervention results when R 0 = 1.9, and blue lines present the case when R 0 = 2.6. (a) Vaccination. (b) School closure.
